member.name: T:ConControls.ConsoleApi.IConsoleGraphics
member.summary: Provides methods to draw on the console.

member.name: M:ConControls.ConsoleApi.IConsoleGraphics.DrawBackground(System.ConsoleColor,System.Drawing.Rectangle)
member.summary: Sets the background in the specified . The changes are only written to the screen buffer when is called.
member.param: The to use for the background.
The area (in screen buffer coordinates) to fill.

member.summary: Draws a border around (onto the edge of) the specified .
member.param: The to use for the background.
The to use for the border foreground.
The to use for the border.
The area (in screen buffer coordinates) to fill.

member.name: M:ConControls.ConsoleApi.IConsoleGraphics.FillArea(System.ConsoleColor,System.ConsoleColor,System.Char,System.Drawing.Rectangle)
member.summary: Fills the specified with the given colors and character.
member.param: The background color to use.
The foreground color to use.
The character to use.
The area to fill.

member.name: M:ConControls.ConsoleApi.IConsoleGraphics.Flush
member.summary: Flushes the internal buffer to the console screen buffer.

member.name: T:ConControls.ConsoleWindow
member.summary: The window for a console UI session.
member.remarks: This window takes control over the console input buffer and the current screen buffer to provide UI functionality. Only one window may be instantiated at a time. Make sure to dispose of any previously instantiated contexts before creating a new one.

member.name: M:ConControls.ConsoleWindow.#ctor
member.summary: Opens a new . Only one instance can exist at a time. Be sure to dispose of any previously instantiated contexts.
member.exception: A previously instantiated has not yet been disposed of. Only a single window can exist at a time.

member.name: M:ConControls.ConsoleWindow.Finalize
member.summary: Cleans up native resources.

member.name: M:ConControls.ConsoleWindow.Invalidate
member.summary: Invalidates the complete window to trigger a complete redrawing of the controls.

member.summary: Checks if the containing this control has already been disposed of and throws an if it is.
member.exception: The containing has already been disposed of.

member.name: M:ConControls.Controls.ConsoleControl.Invalidate(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Invalidates this control to trigger redrawing. If is true, only the client area (without borders) will be invalidated.
member.param: Set this to true if only the client area should be redrawn. This avoids drawing the border and background.

member.name: M:ConControls.Controls.ConsoleControl.Draw
member.summary: Redraws the control.

member.name: M:ConControls.Controls.ConsoleControl.Draw(ConControls.ConsoleApi.IConsoleGraphics)
member.summary: Draws the control onto the console screen buffer. When overwriting this method, make sure to use the to synchronize threads and to call to check if the window has not yet been disposed of. The buffer should be flushed by the caller.
member.param: An that performs the drawing operations on the screen buffer.
member.exception: The containing has already been disposed of.

member.name: M:ConControls.Controls.ConsoleControl.DrawBackground(ConControls.ConsoleApi.IConsoleGraphics)
member.summary: Draws the background onto the console screen buffer. When overwriting this method, make sure to use the to synchronize threads and to call to check if the window has not yet been disposed of. The buffer should be flushed by the caller.
member.param: An that performs the drawing operations on the screen buffer.
member.exception: The containing has already been disposed of.

member.name: M:ConControls.Controls.ConsoleControl.DrawBorder(ConControls.ConsoleApi.IConsoleGraphics)
member.summary: Draws the border of the control onto the console screen buffer and returns the remaining client area. When overwriting this method, make sure to use the to synchronize threads and to call to check if the window has not yet been disposed of. The buffer should be flushed by the caller.
member.param: An that performs the drawing operations on the screen buffer.
member.returns: A representing the available client area.
member.exception: The containing has already been disposed of.

member.name: M:ConControls.Controls.ConsoleControl.DrawClientArea(ConControls.ConsoleApi.IConsoleGraphics)
member.summary: Draws the client area and child controls onto the console screen buffer. When overwriting this method, make sure to use the to synchronize threads and to call to check if the window has not yet been disposed of. The buffer should be flushed by the caller.
member.param: An that performs the drawing operations on the screen buffer.
member.exception: The containing has already been disposed of.

member.name: P:ConControls.Properties.Resources.Exception_CannotFocusUnFocusableControl
member.summary: Sucht eine lokalisierte Zeichenfolge, die This instance of "{0}" cannot be focused! ähnelt.

member.name: P:ConControls.Properties.Resources.Exception_CanOnlyUseSingleContext
member.summary: Sucht eine lokalisierte Zeichenfolge, die There can only be one single console window at a time! Dispose of any existing console window before instantiating a new one. ähnelt.

member.name: P:ConControls.Properties.Resources.Exception_ControlsMustBeContained
member.summary: Sucht eine lokalisierte Zeichenfolge, die ConsoleControl instances must be contained in an IConsoleContainer! Please provide a valid parent. ähnelt.

member.name: P:ConControls.Properties.Resources.Exception_DifferentWindow
member.summary: Sucht eine lokalisierte Zeichenfolge, die The controls cannot be part of different conosle windows! ähnelt.

member.name: P:ConControls.Properties.Resources.Exception_InvalidConsoleColor
member.summary: Sucht eine lokalisierte Zeichenfolge, die The ConsoleColor "{0}" is not supported! ähnelt.

member.name: P:ConControls.Properties.Resources.Exception_ProgressBarPercentageMustBeNonNegative
member.summary: Sucht eine lokalisierte Zeichenfolge, die The percentage value of a progress bar cannot be less than zero! ähnelt.

member.name: P:ConControls.Properties.Resources.Exception_ProgressBarPercentageMustNotBeGreaterThan1
member.summary: Sucht eine lokalisierte Zeichenfolge, die The percentage value of a proress bar cannot be greater than 1! ähnelt.

member.name: P:ConControls.Properties.Resources.Exception_WindowDisposed
